title: 216 - The Thing That's Always Held You Back & The Scientific Way to Defeat It
description:
The New Year is an exciting time but often the excitement is short lived. We have such high hopes for all the changes we're going to make, but most often our hopes are crushed by someone who's very hard to defeat: OURSELVES!

YES. The OLD YOU you want to leave behind is the number 1 thing standing in the way of the NEW YOU you'd like to become and if you try to repress this OLD YOU it just seems to get stronger!

So I guess we should all just give up right?

NO! You have so much untapped potential and there are a few principles that will help you unleash your BEST SELF from the confines of your OLD SELF.

In this episode I want to share what's helped me become a better version of myself and ultimately become the type of person that can build and wield a thriving creative career!

SHOW NOTES
James Clear - Atomic Habits
https://jamesclear.com/

NYT Article - Resistance Is Futile. To Change Habits, Try Replacement Instead.
https://www.nytimes.com/2018/03/19/your-money/resistance-is-futile-to-change-habits-try-replacement-instead.html

RON FUNCHES on the GOOD ONE PODCAST
https://headgum.com/good-one-a-podcast-about-jokes/ron-funchess-fck-linda-neck-tattoo

Conan O'Brien Needs a Friend Podcast
https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/conan-obrien-needs-a-friend/id1438054347?mt=2

The War of Art by Stephen Pressfield
https://stevenpressfield.com/books/the-war-of-art/

CREDITS
Patreon Patron Shoutout!
Thank you JAIME TEMAIRIK! Check out JAIME'S work:
https://www.jaimetemairik.com/
https://www.instagram.com/jaimetem/

Support Creative Pep Talk on Patreon: www.patreon.com/creativepeptalk

Thanks to Yoni Wolf and the band WHY? for our theme music.

Thanks to Alex Sugg for editing and the podcast!
www.alexsugg.com

SPONSORS

Astropad App - Turn Your iPad into a Graphics Tablet! The episode art was made using Astropad! Use promo code PIZZA for 10% Astropad Studio!
http://astropad.com/?utm_source=Creative%20Pep%20Talk&utm_medium=Podcast&utm_campaign=Creative%20Pep%20Talk
